ygData.subject: Re: Matrix Quest/Finding Jotunn
ygData.msgSnippet: Jotunn nodded, then paused quizzically. Jotunn: Of course I will milord, but I was wondering if we should have him join us. He jerked a thumb at Dinobot.

Jotunn nodded, then paused quizzically.

Jotunn: Of course I will milord, b=
ut I was wondering if we should have
him join us.

He jerked a thumb at Din=
obot. Dinobot snorted in contemptbut his pride
was otherwise intact.
